page.title: 13SUPERSTITIONS.
page.content: {Bad Luck}walking under a ladder, cracking a mirror,dropping a glove and picking it up yourself,white cat cros- sing path,hearing the cuckoos before 5th April,a robin hovering over your door a policeman shall be paying you a visit,looking back at your house when leaving,spilt salt must be thrown over left shoulder, the number 13. {Good luck}black cat crossing your path,if a bird poos on you,four leaf clover,a horse shoe is lucky,finding a penny in the street,touching wood, flock of birds,magpies,wishbone, a loose eyelash,itchy palm means money itchy feet means travel,rabbit's foot. {Weather Lore }red sky at night shep- herd's delight,red sky in the morning shepherd's warning,cows lying down it will rain,1st of the month in like a lamb out like a lion & vice versa, standing on a spider it will rain.
